name: Guncraft: Foundry for Ouya (Canceled)
blurb: The ultimate cross-platform companion to Guncraft is at your fingertips. Build maps, design skins, craft weapons, and share!

rewards.reward: Private: Get a copy of Guncraft: Foundry when the Ouya launches. All backers also get their name in the Kickstarter credits of Guncraft: Foundry.
Early Soldier: Get a copy of Guncraft, for PC, AND Guncraft: Foundry. That's a retail value of $22 for $15. You will receive your Guncraft key immediately upon Kickstarter end.
Soldier: Get a copy of Guncraft, for PC, AND Guncraft: Foundry. That's a retail value of $22 for $20. You will receive your Guncraft key immediately upon Kickstarter end.
Corporal: All of the above rewards, plus a DIY Cubecraft Guncraft solider, and an exclusive revolver, usable in Guncraft (all backer weapons are balanced and offer no special advantage in game).
Lieutenant: All above rewards, plus a choice of either a unisex t-shirt or poster.
Early Captain: Both the t-shirt AND poster as well as the exclusive AK-1337, usable in Guncraft.
Captain: Both the t-shirt AND poster as well as the exclusive AK-1337, usable in Guncraft.

The 1 Star General Collector\u2019s Package: This includes everything above plus the RCP-9000 exclusive Guncraft weapon and a legitimate hard copy of the game. This package includes an Xbox style green case, cover art, manual, and disc. These are a onetime only print run that will never be seen again. TRUE COLLECTORS should start here.

The 1 Star General Collector\u2019s Package, Limited Collector\u2019s Edition: A truly collectible, collectible. On top of receiving the above, we will take a photo of you (or your desired person) and generate a model of you to be used as a playable character. You will truly be the master of other people\u2019s destruction with this set. Did we mention how limited and collectible this set is?

The 2 Star General Collector\u2019s Package: All of the above, amazing, rewards, plus a truly fantastic bonus. A collectible display statue. This is a true, AAA status video game collectible right here. This beautiful piece is made out of top quality material and will look great in any house or office. Check out the picture to see it yourself. You'll also receive the last exclusive weapon, the beam saber!

Early 4 Star General Collector\u2019s Package, EVERYTHING edition: The package just oozes collector's edition content. Not only is this the only non-limited way to get a custom character model, you also get your copies of EVERYTHING  signed by members of the dev team, ANNNND you get every set of DLC for Guncraft that comes out. Good lord, this is just getting out of control. One last thing... You get Gold Founder status. This is the last time any kind of Founder status will be available. Get your name in gold, in game, and be put above lesser founders in chat!

4 Star General Collector\u2019s Package, EVERYTHING edition: The package just oozes collector's edition content. Not only is this the only non-limited way to get a custom character model, you also get your copies of EVERYTHING  signed by members of the dev team, ANNNND you get every set of DLC for Guncraft that comes out. Good lord, this is just getting out of control. One last thing... You get Gold Founder status. This is the last time any kind of Founder status will be available. Get your name in gold, in game, and be put above lesser founders in chat!

Gunnery General (yes, not a real rank): All of the above rewards, plus we will work with you to create a weapon of your design (medieval, modern, sci-fi, goofy, you name it), to be included in the PC game, regardless of whether or not the gun crafting ability is implemented. You will also have a Kickstarter badge associated to your gun, to let people know how epic you are.

LAN PARTAY! All previous rewards (except custom gun) plus the entire in-house Guncraft development team will fly to your state (U.S. only) and run a Guncraft LAN party for you and your friends. We will live stream the event (if you want), supply food, and bring the keg (assuming you are all of age). It will be a party of epic proportions! Contact us first so we can iron out the details.

Presidential VIP Super Duper Package: Because you are just the greatest person to ever live, we saved the best prize for you! On top of all the above rewards, you'll get a 3D printed model of Craft Tower, as an action set piece. There will be soldiers and vehicles around the battlefield, destruction, construction, and other various epicness to simulate a snapshot of an in game match. On top of that, you'll get every game EVER made by us, on top of all DLC. Plus, we will give you the infamous developer "cyan" color in game and our skype usernames, so you can chat with us anytime you want. Be on the same level as Guncraft devs and we will call you one of our own.\r\n\r\nOh and free shipping! XD
